thread.title: Cortana: Microsoft’s virtual assistant

title: Cortana: Microsoft’s virtual assistant
text: Cortana, Microsoft's digital personal assistant, can help you when you're late according to snr product manager Robert Epstein. Recent related news Agent Q Is A Virtual Assistant That’s Focused On Helping You Shop Online It seems like everyone wants to build a virtual assistant that you communicate with via text message.
